actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to provide a remedy for sex discrimination by the insurance business with respect to the availability and scope of insurance coverage for women.

summary.text: Prohibits any discrimination on the basis of sex in contracts for, or terms of, insurance policies other than in accordance with relevant actuarial data.

titles.title: A bill to provide a remedy for sex discrimination by the insurance business with respect to the availability and scope of insurance coverage for women.
